body_html:
Hmm looks like made a mistake and didn't fully retest this. Sorry about that!

C10D hangs for multi-gpu + multi-machine. As before, it only happens when batch-norm is set to full precision. Note: it works fine for single-machine, multi-gpu now (as #13496 seems to fix that).

Deadlock happens on this line:
https://gist.github.com/bearpelican/c93ebe5513417055582e6137eedd514f#file-pytorch_minimal_4machine-py-L85

I believe this is the stacktrace:
https://gist.github.com/bearpelican/4808a4d0b3008f5afc068104e5876475

This is with latest branch - 1.0.0a0+6360c3
Cuda 10, NCCL 2.3.7, Cudnn 7.4.1
